summary:
ABOUT:
This adds a race from the sands of Elsweyr. As part of the many Khajiit tribes there, this tribe is part human. There skills are the same as the Khajiit.
descriptionHtml:
First, I can NOT take full credit for this mod. This mod was created by eqlipse. I simply added little more texture, expressions with ears, mouth, eyes, and eye brows. Also made it compatible with most body mods. You can find eqlipse here:

http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/topic/6586-so-i-decided-to-create-a-better-ohmes-raht-race/



This mod is made for the Females. The males just look like Bretons. Meaning I haven't created one for the males yet.The scale height of the female are the same as Bretons. This does not replace the Khajiit Races in Skyrim itself. This is a new race that's added to the racemenu. For body mods, I mainly used UNP-B, 7BASE, and CBBE vanilla. I know for sure these body shapes work. I haven't tried all the other possible Body types. Also added Three war paints from the Khajiit over to this race as well.


Please do upload your created characters!!! Would love to see them.

To Install:
I highly recommend you use SKSE.
or
Simply unzip the folder, go to your Skyrim directory, copy textures, meshes, the esp and esm into your Skyrim data folder.

Requirements:

RaceCombatibility




Some Mods Seen in Screenshots:



Apachii Hair (Hair)
Circlet 2k - or - 4k (Circlet)
Edhildils UNPB Witch Doctor BBP (Armor)
real girls - medium- (For Human Skin Tone)
DragonSteel Weapons (Weapon set)
Sexy Tsuns Armor Mashup 7B Cleavage
7Base Armor - Orcish and Hide
author: Morvayn
